sense.def:
To add one thing to another
pomeni dati eno stvar k drugi.

seg.quote: She added a tree to the picture.

sense.def:
To add numbers or amounts
pomeni izračunati vsoto števil ali količin.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
adds to something else
, povzroči, da je druga stvar po stopnji ali količini večja.

seg.quote: He is given answers that only add to his confusion.
This process adds an extra £3 to the cost.

sense.def:
Če človek med govorjenjem
adds something
, pove še nekaj.

seg.quote: He added that the fee would be £100.

sense.def:
To add up several numbers
pomeni izračunati vsoto več števil.

Če dejstva ali dogodki
add up
, zaradi njih dojamemo pravi značaj okoliščin.

seg.quote: It all added up. I became aware that Halliday was the thief.

sense.def:
Če zneski
add up to a particular total
, pomeni, da jih seštejemo in dobimo rezultat.

seg.quote: This adds up to 75,000 miles of new streets.
